content: **subscribe and enjoy 30% off your next ambah pattern purchase** 6 **k2tog** with us in ambah s ravelry group 7 7 http //www ravelry com/groups/ambah 6 https //dashboard mailerlite com/forms/360661/102420907190912128/share i ve always been a big fan of roses - faux and real the scent the romance the beauty i have a collection of fake roses where i have glued metal clips on these i wear in my hair as a brooch and also use to make garlands for decorating with - i especially love decorating my solstice/christmas tree with these last year my knit group had a handmade ornament gift exchange for our december festivities and i decided to create a knitted rose for my contribution to the kris kringle i have been meaning to make another for myself and write up the pattern to share and now the day has come enjoy this pattern download for free and i look forward to seeing your festive roses share here and with #ambahobrien and #festiverose
